original_text:
Fine embroidered linen from Egypt was your sail
    and served as your banner;
your awnings were of blue and purple
    from the coasts of Elishah.
korean_text: 애굽의 수 놓은 가는 베로 돛을 만들어 깃발을 삼았음이여 엘리사 섬의 청색 자색 베로 차일을 만들었도다

sentences.original_text: Fine embroidered linen from Egypt was your sail
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트에서 온 화려한 자수된 린넨이 너의 돛이었고

sentences.original_text: your awnings were of blue and purple
